nodes.text: Silvuit Corporation was the manufacturer of the Svelte-class Imperial shuttle and the Vibre-class assault cruiser.

Silvuit Corporation was a minor starship manufacturer during the Rebellion era. The company often worked as subcontractors with Sienar Fleet Systems on projects such as the Lambda-class T-4a shuttle. Following the Battle of Endor, Silvuit continued to work with the Empire and became one of the major suppliers for the Imperial Remnant.
